name: Old-school BSN CSS Mod for Stylish
description: This Style creates a darker Theme for the new Bioware forums, similar to the old BSN forums.
additional_info:
Release: 1.2: added Background theme selection, fixed white area below background image.
Release: 1.1: added !important to force custom background image.
Credits: The CSS was originally created for greasemonkey by user dannyboy731, see also http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/398825 - all the credits and rights are his, I just adapted it for Stylish with some minor changes.
Background: just replace the link in background-image: url to your own background
